metadata.name: Potential Xterm Reverse Shell
metadata.comment: Detects usage of "xterm" as a potential reverse shell tunnel

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND contains(lower(process.name), lower('xterm')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-display')) AND endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':1')))

output.summary: Detects usage of "xterm" as a potential reverse shell tunnel
